name: The Blood Court
description: An ancient aristocratic civilization of blood-drinking immortals who rule from gothic castles shrouded in eternal night. The Blood Court drains life from their enemies, transforming into creatures of darkness and commanding legions of thralls.
shortDescription: Gothic vampires - life steal, night power, transformation, immortal heroes

lore.origin: Born from the first mortal who drank from the Crimson Wellspring, the Blood Court emerged in an age before recorded history. They established a shadow empire, ruling from towering citadels and treating mortals as cattle.
lore.motivation: To expand their eternal dominion, gather blood tribute from all living creatures, and plunge the world into eternal night where their power is absolute
lore.culture: A rigid aristocratic hierarchy where age and blood purity determine rank. Elder vampires command absolute loyalty from their progeny, and intricate blood pacts bind the court together in an unbreakable web of obligation.

strengths.name: Life Steal
strengths.description: All vampire units heal when dealing damage to enemies

strengths.name: Night Power
strengths.description: +50% to all stats during night time, enabling devastating night raids

strengths.name: Transformation
strengths.description: Many units can transform between forms (bat, wolf, mist) for tactical advantage

strengths.name: Immortal Heroes
strengths.description: Heroes automatically revive at the Coffin Vault after death

strengths.name: Blood Economy
strengths.description: Gain Blood resource from kills, used for powerful abilities and transformations

strengths.name: Domination
strengths.description: Can mind-control enemy units and convert them to thralls

weaknesses.name: Sunlight Vulnerability
weaknesses.description: -25% to all stats during daylight, some units take damage

weaknesses.name: Holy Vulnerability
weaknesses.description: Takes 75% increased damage from holy and light-based attacks

weaknesses.name: Fire Vulnerability
weaknesses.description: Takes 50% increased damage from fire-based attacks

weaknesses.name: Running Water
weaknesses.description: Cannot cross rivers or deep water without bridges

weaknesses.name: Invitation Required
weaknesses.description: Cannot enter enemy buildings to garrison without defeating all defenders

bloodSystem.description: Blood is harvested from kills and used for transformations, abilities, and powerful rituals

dayNightCycle.description: Vampires gain power at night and weaken during the day

transformationSystem.description: Vampires can transform between humanoid, bat, wolf, and mist forms

lifeStealSystem.description: All vampire units heal for a percentage of damage dealt

heroRevival.description: Vampire heroes automatically revive at the Coffin Vault

thrallSystem.description: Dominated enemies become permanent thralls serving the Blood Court

blood.name: Blood
blood.description: Harvested from slain enemies, powers vampire abilities and transformations

souls.name: Souls
souls.description: Captured from powerful enemies, used for dark rituals and summoning

author: Vehement Development Team
